publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4727 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Support for Scottish Food Fortnightâ€”That the Parliament fully supports the objectives of Scottish Food Fortnight, which runs from 1 to 17 September 2006, in promoting the use of healthy Scottish produce and in the re-establishment of links between consumers and producers in this country, and accepts, furthermore, that this initiative will help the economic well-being of rural areas in Scotland through the promotion of local food.
S2M-4727 Support for Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 August 2006) Christine Grahame*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4727 Support for Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 August 2006) Donald Gorrie*
